title: STRAP IN FOR THE BATTLE ARMOR EVENT
short_desc: Up your game as we up the armor. Drop in with your armor locked and prove you’ve got the skills to come out on top.

title: DON'T LEAVE THIS EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME WRAITH SKIN BEHIND
short_desc: Remember to pick up your Forgotten in the Void Wraith skin, free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: THE OLD WAYS EVENT PATCH NOTES
short_desc: Learn about all the tweaks, fixes, and updates coming to Apex Legends along with the Old Ways Event.

title: FOLLOW BLOODHOUND’S TRAIL IN THE OLD WAYS LORE EVENT
short_desc: Take on the new Bloodhound Town Takeover and unlock exclusive rewards in The Old Ways Event, April 7-21.

title: GET LUCKY WITH THIS EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME MIRAGE SKIN
short_desc: Go green for St. Patrick’s Day with the Lucky Charmer Mirage skin, free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: SYSTEM OVERRIDE COLLECTION EVENT PATCH NOTES
short_desc: Check out all the tweaks, fixes, and updates coming to Apex Legends along with the System Override Event, running March 3-17.

title: GET AMPED FOR THE SYSTEM OVERRIDE COLLECTION EVENT
short_desc: Drop in for new modes, old maps, Legendary Weapon skins, cybernetic cosmetics and more, March 3-17.

title: APEX LEGENDS – SPIN CIRCLES AROUND YOUR ENEMIES WITH THE OCTANE EDITION
short_desc: Sink your teeth into the Octane Edition, packed full of juicy items to add to your collection.

title: INVITE THAT SPECIAL SOMEONE TO JOIN YOU FOR RENDEZVOUS
short_desc: Play Duos and get themed items during the Valentine’s Day Rendezvous - Feb. 11-18

title: TUG OUT THEIR HEART STRINGS WITH THIS EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME REVENANT SKIN
short_desc: Get this romantic-ish Revenant skin free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: SEASON 4 MAP UPDATES EXPLAINED
short_desc: The Planet Harvester has split Capitol City apart -- and that’s just the start. Learn what you can expect from the latest changes.

title: CLAIM YOUR APEX LEGENDS ANNIVERSARY GIFT
short_desc: Celebrate Our First Anniversary With Free Login Gifts When Season 4 Launches

title: ANNOUNCING APEX LEGENDS RANKED SERIES 3
short_desc: Get the details on what’s in store for Ranked Leagues when Season 4 - Assimilation launches on February 4.

title: CRAZY MEETS CLASSY WITH THIS EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME CAUSTIC SKIN
short_desc: Get this spectacular skin free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: APEX LEGENDS – GRAND SOIRÉE ARCADE EVENT
short_desc: Attend the Grand Soirée from January 14-28, featuring seven splendid limited-time modes and plentiful prizes.

title: ANNOUNCING THE APEX LEGENDS GLOBAL SERIES
short_desc: Online and live events around the world featuring more than $3 million in prizes are coming soon!

title: HACK YOUR ENEMIES (TO PIECES) WITH AN EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME CRYPTO SKIN
short_desc: Get this infectious new skin free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: MIRAGE’S HOLO-DAY BASH COLLECTION EVENT
short_desc: From December 12 to January 7 we will be running our next limited-time event for Apex Legends, Mirage’s Holo-Day Bash.

title: CLAIM YOUR FREE BP-1 PATHFINDER SKIN
short_desc: In Celebration Of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, Apex Legends is releasing the BP-1 Pathfinder Skin for free

title: APEX LEGENDS LIFELINE AND BLOODHOUND DOUBLE PACK AVAILABLE NOW
short_desc: Get exclusive skins for Lifeline and Bloodhound, Apex Coins, and more!

title: LEVEL CAP INCREASE, PROGRESSION CHANGES, MORE EARNABLE APEX PACKS, AND MORE
short_desc: Learn more about the upcoming changes to Player Level progression and rewards coming December 3rd.

title: WELCOME TO THE APEX LEGENDS SHOP!
short_desc: Check out what’s available in our grand opening.

title: FIGHT OR FRIGHT COLLECTION EVENT
short_desc: From October 15 to November 5 we will be running our next limited-time event for Apex Legends.

title: START A CHAIN REACTION WITH AN EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME CAUSTIC SKIN
short_desc: Get this breathtaking skin free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: APEX LEGENDS RANKED LEAGUE SERIES 2 KICKS OFF OCTOBER 1
short_desc: Get all the details on Series 2 from the Respawn team

title: APEX LEGENDS LIFELINE EDITION AND APEX LEGENDS BLOODHOUND EDITION AVAILABLE OCTOBER 18
short_desc: Grab exclusive skins for Lifeline and Bloodhound, themed weapon skins, and more in these physical editions of Apex Legends.

title: WATCH THE BEST TEAMS IN THE WORLD COMPETE AT THE APEX PRESEASON INVITATIONAL
short_desc: Catch all the action September 13 – 15 in Kraków, Poland or streaming live on Twitch, YouTube, Mixer, and Facebook!

title: GET TO BAMBOOZLIN’ WITH EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME MIRAGE AND KRABER SKINS
short_desc: Grab these skins before they disappear, free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: VOIDWALKER LIMITED TIME EVENT & PATCH NOTES
short_desc: A two-week long event focused on everyone’s favorite interdimensional skirmisher.

title: APEX LEGENDS VOIDWALKER EVENT
short_desc: A mysterious research site has been unearthed in Kings Canyon that was used as part of Project: Wraith.

short_desc: Learn more about Apex Legends in-game events from Director of Product Management for Apex Legends, Lee Horn.

title: AN UPDATE ON THE IRON CROWN COLLECTION EVENT
short_desc: Respawn Entertainment’s Drew McCoy provides players an update on the event.

title: CRASH INTO AN EXCLUSIVE OCTANE SKIN WITH TWITCH PRIME
short_desc: Get a skin so good it’ll give you whiplash, free with your Twitch Prime membership.

title: REIGN OVER THE ARENA DURING THE APEX LEGENDS IRON CROWN COLLECTION EVENT
short_desc: A limited-time Solo mode, an Octane Town Takeover, and more are waiting in the Apex Arena.
